__e: Why do you say these things to me?
What gives you the right to say that?
Why the hell do you talk like this behind people's back? Let's go!
So tell me again: why don't you just tell your family about our little secret project?
Why don't you talk to your friends, people you trust.
- I don't know, but why don't you talk to your parents first?
- Are you talking to me or the dog?
What kind of a way is that to talk to your friend who gives you money?
Do you have any contact with your mother at all?
And what are we even talking about?
Why speak of your father and me?
But you say man and wife?
